name: Royal Palm Plaza Resort

reviews.text: Beautiful hotel, with a fantastic pool and very cofortable rooms. Its spanish-american architecture makes you feel you are in a Florida resort. The surroundings are horrible. A bit expensive for what it is.
reviews.title: Pretend you are in Miami
Great experience
reviews.text: Just returned from a business trip in Campinas Brazil, and utilized the beautiful acommodations at the Royal Palm hotel. The staff was very professional, and due to my inability to speak Portugese, their ability to speak English made the stay more enjoyable. Unfortunately, Sao Paulo and surrounding areas have a reputation for toughness, highlighted by an occassional irrational act of violence. The facility's visible security measures and comfortable accommodations ensured both physical and mental peacefulness. I would highly recommend this facility as a place to enjoy the cultural marvels of beautiful Campinas Brazil.

reviews.title: A little great santuary in the middle of the city

reviews.text: A company I was visiting booked this hotel for me and I was really happy that I stayed at this hotel. The room was very clean, and staff was very friendly and polite. The hotel has a very large pool in the courtyard and a nice fitness center. Unfortunately, I was not able to enjoy the pool as it was too cold outside. There are several dining options inside the hotel, and the food I ordered from room service menu as well as breakfast was very good as well.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: The only downside is its location. It is somewhat away from the city center, and you won't be able to walk to restaurants or shops.
reviews.title: Best ever

reviews.text: One of the finest hotels I have ever visited, with outstanding service, beautiful rooms, exquisite grounds and amazing food. A must for any business traveler or for tourism. Do not miss. Easy access to major highways.
reviews.title: A lovely resort

reviews.text: The Royal Palm Plaza is a lovely resort, just on the outskirts of the city of Campinas. The rooms are very spacious and well appointed, the service is extremely helpful and friendly. Breakfast and dinner is excellent, served throughout the myriad of eating places in the resort, and aswell there are some lovely bars / winecellars, all with portuguese-themed names. The swimming pool is enourmous and just delightful. Location is not great - being quite some distance from the centre in an area surrounded only by motorways, requiring always a taxi to go anywhere.
reviews.title: Good stay at the Royal Palm

reviews.text: I travelled to Brazil on business and the client booked this hotel on my behalf.
reviews.title: Best hotel in town

likes.liked: — a resort like setting in a big city

description: A real resort must be the destiny itself: it must be complete. Ready to meet customers’ expectations, regardless guests are on a business trip or traveling for fun. With this in mind, the Royal Palm Plaza has been excelling among the best and most complete resorts in Brazil. The Royal Palm Plaza offers a unique, diversified and welcoming infrastructure. Several bars and restaurants, recreational areas, event rooms and a helpful and polite service. Whatever the reason of your stay, the resort’s team will do its best to make it be unforgettable!
